Title: Let it Cook - More Spec Kit for Spec-Driven Development with Den
Description:
Den comes back on to show us how to cook with the new Spec-Kit project: https://github.com/github/spec-kit. Spec-Driven Development flips the script on traditional software development. For decades, code has been king ‚Äî specifications were just scaffolding we built and discarded once the "real work" of coding began. Spec-Driven Development changes this: specifications become executable, directly generating working implementations rather than just guiding them. Let's take a look at is live with Den!
